title: Kruger Explorer
short_description: A luxurious and immersive safari adventure.
long_description: Step into the heart of Sabi Sands Game Reserve, a world-renowned private wilderness offering unmatched leopard and big cat photography opportunities. This 6-day exclusive photographic safari is crafted for photographers seeking the ultimate predator encounters. It features specialized low-angle safari vehicles, off-road tracking, and expert coaching to capture striking, close-up wildlife portraits.From the legendary MalaMala, where leopards are seen almost daily, to the pristine landscapes of Ulusaba, where golden-hour lion hunts unfold before your lens, every moment is designed to elevate your wildlife storytelling and technical photography skills.

itinerary_summary.label: Day 1 - 3
itinerary_summary.title: Arrive in Nairobi
itinerary_summary.description: Experience the wild like never before. Join us for a thrilling adventure in the heart of Africa. Our Masai Mara Safari offers an unforgettable experience, where you can witness the majestic wildlife in their natural habitat. From the iconic Big Five to the breathtaking landscapes, this safari is designed for those who seek adventure and luxury.
itinerary_summary.long_description: Experience the wild like never before. Join us for a thrilling adventure in the heart of Africa. Our Masai Mara Safari offers an unforgettable experience, where you can witness the majestic wildlife in their natural habitat. From the iconic Big Five to the breathtaking landscapes, this safari is designed for those who seek adventure and luxury.

itinerary_summary.label: Day 3 - 4
itinerary_summary.title: Ngorongoro Crater
itinerary_summary.description: Explore the breathtaking landscapes of Ngorongoro Crater. This UNESCO World Heritage Site is home to a diverse range of wildlife and stunning scenery.
itinerary_summary.long_description: Explore the breathtaking landscapes of Ngorongoro Crater. This UNESCO World Heritage Site is home to a diverse range of wildlife and stunning scenery. Experience the wild like never before. Join us for a thrilling adventure in the heart of Africa. Our Masai Mara Safari offers an unforgettable experience, where you can witness the majestic wildlife in their natural habitat. From the iconic Big Five to the breathtaking landscapes, this safari is designed for those who seek adventure and luxury.

itinerary_summary.label: Day 4 - 7
itinerary_summary.title: Sabi Sands Game Reserve
itinerary_summary.description: Sabi Sands Game Reserve is a world-renowned private wilderness offering unmatched leopard and big cat photography opportunities.
itinerary_summary.long_description: Sabi Sands Game Reserve is a world-renowned private wilderness offering unmatched leopard and big cat photography opportunities. Experience the wild like never before. Join us for a thrilling adventure in the heart of Africa. Our Masai Mara Safari offers an unforgettable experience, where you can witness the majestic wildlife in their natural habitat. From the iconic Big Five to the breathtaking landscapes, this safari is designed for those who seek adventure and luxury.

itinerary_summary.label: Day 7 - 11
itinerary_summary.title: End your adventure in Cape Town
itinerary_summary.description: End your adventure in the heart of the Cape Town. This vibrant city is known for its stunning landscapes, rich history, and diverse culture.
itinerary_summary.long_description: End your adventure in the heart of the Cape Town. This vibrant city is known for its stunning landscapes, rich history, and diverse culture.
